definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The kit came with several drill bits and accessories.
sentences.chinese: 工具包中还有几把钻头和其他附件。

sentences.english: The nonlinear effects of curvature of wellbore on the side forces on bit are shown by the compu…
sentences.chinese: 计算表明了井眼曲率对钻头侧向力的非线性效应。

sentences.english: The technology and the die design of cold extruding for the electric hammer drill is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电锤钻头冷挤压工艺及模具设计。
记下钻头系列号和型号。

sentences.english: Electrodeposited diamond bits on thin-wall steel body are new drilling tools for construction.
sentences.chinese: 电沉积金刚石薄壁工程钻头是一种新型钻孔工具。

sentences.english: Removing Duette blinds is very simple and only requires a drill with a Phillips drill bit.
sentences.chinese: 卸下迪埃特百叶窗非常简单，只需要一个十字钻头钻。

sentences.english: Gravity acts on the large mass of the collars to provide the downward force needed for the bits to efficiently break rock.
sentences.chinese: 钻铤的重量提供了钻头有效破碎岩石所需要的向下力。

sentences.english: At the end the drill is free.
This paper introduces the application of the object-oriented technology in three roller bit simulation.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了面向对象技术在三牙轮钻头仿真中的应用。

sentences.english: Secondly, the different model bits affect the rule of the vibration sources, which is studied.
sentences.chinese: 不同型号钻头对激振源规律影响的实验研究。

sentences.english: Requirement on bit steerability is satisfied with the bit's short gage and active gage protection design.
sentences.chinese: 短保径与主动保径设计，满足钻头导向性需求。

sentences.english: Drill bits for dowel and bolts and cord.
sentences.chinese: 钻头的销子和螺栓和脊髓。

sentences.english: Soon, the steam drill andoftheother machines replaced thesteeldriverssteel-drivers.
sentences.chinese: 不久，蒸汽钻头和其它机器取代了钻铁工人。

sentences.english: For measurements-while-drilling, the reference is the bit (the driller's depth).
sentences.chinese: 对于随钻测量，参考点是钻头的深度。

sentences.english: Already the Snowblast's huge auger blades were engorging snow.
sentences.chinese: 扬雪车上庞大的钻头叶片在开始大量吞进积雪。

sentences.english: As the diamond tip of the drill revolves, it is lubricated by mud.
sentences.chinese: 钻探机的金钢石钻头转动时，由泥浆起润滑作用。

definition: to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
to widen a tube/to ream (i.e. widen a hole)
